{"id":1406393520,"question_id":3380,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 1 week","timestamp":1727635664,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"184 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1406393520/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Shortest Subarray With OR at Least K II","memory":"88.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    struct Orray {\n        vector<int> cnt;\n        Orray() : cnt(31, 0) {}\n        int sum() {\n            int s = 0;\n            for (int i=0; i<31; i++) {\n                if (cnt[i]) s += (1 << i);\n            }\n            return s;\n        }\n        void operator+=(int const& i) {\n            for (int j=31; j>=0; j--) \n                if (i & (1 << j))\n                    cnt[j]++;\n        }\n        void operator-=(int const& i) {\n            for (int j=31; j>=0; j--) \n                if (i & (1 << j))\n                    cnt[j]--;\n        }\n    };\n\n    int minimumSubarrayLength(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        int ans = INT_MAX;\n\n        Orray arr;\n        for (int l=0, r=-1; l<N && r<N; l++) {\n            while (r+1<N && (arr.sum() < k || l>r)) {\n                r++;\n                arr += (nums[r]);\n            }\n            if (arr.sum() >= k)\n                ans = min(ans, r-l+1);\n            arr -= (nums[l]); \n        }\n        return (ans == INT_MAX ? -1 : ans);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"shortest-subarray-with-or-at-least-k-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
